meanings.sent1: She is repackaging the cookies for the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: After the holidays, the store repackages unsold items for clearance sales.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved repackaging a rabbit in a hat!
meanings.sent4: He repackaged his old ideas in a fresh, innovative way.
meanings.sent5: The company is repackaging its image to attract younger customers.

meanings.definition: The act of putting something in a new package
meanings.sent1: The repackaging of the product made it more appealing to customers.
meanings.sent2: The repackaging of the book included bonus content for readers.
meanings.sent3: The repackaging of the gift made it look more impressive than it actually was.
meanings.sent4: The repackaging of the software gave it a sleek new look.
meanings.sent5: The repackaging of the snacks caught the attention of shoppers.
